song_lyrics: He sono avasar āyo āj,
Mero beḍo pār ho gyo,
Guru guṇiyal mīliyā āj,
Mero beḍo pār ho gyo... Sono
Me to lakh chorāsī bhaṭakyo, hā jī hā jī,
Khāre bhav-sāgar me aṭakyo, hā jī hā jī,
Āj mīliyā hai,
Āj mīliyā tāraṇ-hār... Mero
Āj ānand chhāyo re, mangal din āyo re,
Āj ānand chhāyo, mangal din āyo,
Khushiyā bhar lāyo, janam din āyo re,
Janam din āyo re, janam din āyo re...
Huḍ dang machāto āyo, yu rang jamāto āyo,
Yu sāj bajāto āyo, yu ang firakāto āyo,
Āyo re... Janam din āyo re...
Jī ko Swāmī ro jash gāve, un ro janam safal ho jāve,
Yu hār sohāto āyo, yu man harasāto āyo,
Āyo re... Janam dīn āyo re...
Haiyānā notarā svikāro Pramukh Swāmī,
Āvo padhāro am āngaṇe ho jī re,
He manno moralo nāchyo re umangmā,
Madhurī moralī vāge ho jī re... Haiyānā
He āj amṛut relāy,
He dashe dish chhalakāy,
Mīṭhā gīto gavāy, kevā haiyā harakhāy,
Shrījīne sāthe tame lāvo Pramukh Swāmī,
Mannā mandiriye birājo ho jī re... Haiyānā
Dhanya dhanya ā avasar dhanya divas āj,
Pramukh Swāmī rūpe āje maḷyā Shrījī Mahārāj,
Gāvo gāvo re guṇalā gāvo re.. Dhanya
Gāvo re gāvo re guṇ gāvo re gāvo re guṇ gāvo re,
Āvo re āvo re doḍī āvo re āvo re doḍī āvo re.
Rome rome akhanḍ birāje Swāminārāyaṇ āj,
Āvyā Akṣhardhāmthī Swāmī saunā kalyāṇ karavā kāj,
Rome rome akhanḍ birāje Swāminārāyaṇ āj,
Gāvo re gāvo re guṇ gāvo re gāvo re guṇ gāvo re,
Āvo re āvo re doḍī āvo re āvo re doḍī āvo re.
Dhanya dhanya ā avasar dhanya divas āj...
title: He sono avasar āyo āj

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1303: Sadhu Priyadarshandas; Sadhu Kirtanpriyadas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
